text: Sets edge group membership in a geometry.
int setedgegroup(int geohandle, string name, int pt0, int pt1, int value)
Changes an edge group membership on the given geometry. If the group does not exist, it will be created.
is a handle to the geometry to write to.
can be used to get a handle to the current geometry.
is the name of the group to modify.
are the point pair the edge to change group membership for.
is anything other than 0, the point will be in the group.

summary: Sets edge group membership in a geometry.
title: setedgegroup
